dct_title_s: Plan of the city of New York, in North America, surveyed in the years 1766 & 1767 : to his excellency Sir Henry Moore, Bart., Capitain General & Governour in Chief in and over His Majesty's province of New York ... this plan of the city of New York & its environs ... is most humbly dedicated
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by soundings. Facsimile. "Lith. G. Hayward, 120 Water Street, New York, For D.T. Valentine's Manual, 1854." Includes decorative cartouche and ancillary view, A south west view of the city of New York taken from the Governour's Island at * [i.e. asterisk]. Historic Maps copy 1 is mounted on cardboard.
dct_publisher_sm: [New York : Common Council, 1854] (New York : G. Hayward)
